trans-unit.source: Allows you to override attributes applied to properties, fields, and classes when you use an <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer" /> to serialize or deserialize an object as encoded SOAP.
trans-unit.target: 允许您在使用 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer" /> 将对象序列化或反序列化为编码的 SOAP 时重写应用于属性、字段和类的特性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> class enables an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> to override the default way of serializing a set of objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>类启用<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>重写的序列化一组对象的默认方式。

trans-unit.source: Overriding serialization in this way has two uses: first, you can control and augment the serialization of objects found in a DLL, even if you do not have access to the source; second, you can create one set of serializable classes, but serialize the objects in multiple ways.
trans-unit.target: 重写这种方式中的序列化有两个用途： 首先，你可以控制和增加的 DLL 中找到的对象序列化，即使到源，则不能访问其次，你可以创建一组可序列化的类，但采用多种方式对象进行序列化。

trans-unit.source: For example, instead of serializing members of a class instance as XML elements, you can serialize them as XML attributes, resulting in a more efficient document to transport.
trans-unit.target: 例如，而不是序列化的类实例作为 XML 元素的成员，你可以序列化为它们的 XML 属性，从而更高效的文档中传输。

trans-unit.source: After you create a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>, you create an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> using the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter.ImportTypeMapping%2A> method of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter> class.
trans-unit.target: 在创建后<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>，你创建<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping>使用<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter.ImportTypeMapping%2A>方法<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter>类。

trans-unit.source: Pass the resulting object as an argument to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 将生成的对象作为参数传递<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.%23ctor%2A>构造函数。

trans-unit.source: The resulting <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> uses the data contained by the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> to override attributes that control how objects are serialized.
trans-unit.target: 生成<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>使用包含的数据<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>来覆盖控制如何序列化对象的属性。

trans-unit.source: To accomplish this, the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> contains a collection of the object types that are overridden, as well as a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> associated with each overridden object type.
trans-unit.target: 若要实现此目的，<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>包含的对象类型已重写的集合以及<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>与每个被重写的对象类型关联。

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> contains an appropriate set of attribute objects that control how each field, property, or class is serialized.
trans-unit.target: 每个<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>包含一组适当的属性对象用于控制如何序列化每个字段、 属性或类。

trans-unit.source: The process for creating and using a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> is as follows:
trans-unit.target: 创建和使用的过程<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>如下：

trans-unit.source: Create a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>.
trans-unit.target: 创建 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>。

trans-unit.source: Create an attribute object that is appropriate to the object being overridden.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个属性对象，它适合于重写的对象。

trans-unit.source: For example, to override a field or property, create a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute>, using the new, derived type.
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要重写的字段或属性，创建<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute>，使用新的派生类型。

trans-unit.source: You can optionally assign a new <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute.ElementName%2A> that overrides the base class's attribute name or namespace.
trans-unit.target: 你可以选择分配新<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute.ElementName%2A>可重写基类的属性名称或命名空间。

trans-unit.source: Add the attribute object to the appropriate <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> property or collection.
trans-unit.target: 将属性对象添加到相应<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>属性或集合。

trans-unit.source: For example, you would set the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes.SoapElement%2A> property of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> object to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute> and specify the member name that is being overridden.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你将设置<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes.SoapElement%2A>属性<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>对象传递给<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute>并指定是否会重写的成员名称。

trans-unit.source: Create a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>.
trans-unit.target: 创建 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>。

trans-unit.source: Add the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> using the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 添加<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>到<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>使用<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides.Add%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If the object being overridden is a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute>, you need only specify the type of the overridden object.
trans-unit.target: 重写的对象是否<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute>，只需指定重写对象的类型。

trans-unit.source: But if you are overriding a field or property, you must also specify the name of the overridden member.
trans-unit.target: 但如果你要重写的字段或属性，你还必须指定重写的成员的名称。

trans-unit.source: Create an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> using the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter.ImportTypeMapping%2A> method of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter> class.
trans-unit.target: 创建<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping>使用<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter.ImportTypeMapping%2A>方法<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter>类。

trans-unit.source: When constructing the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>, pass the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 在构造时<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>，传递<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping>到<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.%23ctor%2A>构造函数。

trans-unit.source: Use the resulting <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> to serialize or deserialize the class objects.
trans-unit.target: 使用生成<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>要序列化或反序列化的类对象。

trans-unit.source: The following example serializes a class named `Group`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例序列化类名为`Group`。

trans-unit.source: The serialization of the `GroupName` and `IgnoreThis` fields and the members of the `GroupType` enumeration are overridden.
trans-unit.target: 序列化`GroupName`和`IgnoreThis`字段和的成员`GroupType`枚举将被重写。

trans-unit.source: In the `CreateOverrideSerializer` method, a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> is created, and for each overridden member or enumeration, a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> is created with the appropriate property set and added to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>.
trans-unit.target: 在`CreateOverrideSerializer`方法，<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>已创建，，并为每个重写的成员或枚举即<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>创建相应的属性设置，并添加到<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> is created using the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>, and that <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> is used to create the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> that overrides the default serialization.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping>使用创建<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>，且<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping>用于创建<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>可重写默认的序列化。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The following example serializes a class named `Group`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例序列化类名为`Group`。

trans-unit.source: The serialization of the `GroupName` and `IgnoreThis` fields and the members of the `GroupType` enumeration are overridden.
trans-unit.target: 序列化`GroupName`和`IgnoreThis`字段和的成员`GroupType`枚举将被重写。

trans-unit.source: In the `CreateOverrideSerializer` method, a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> is created, and for each overridden member or enumeration, a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> is created with the appropriate property set and added to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>.
trans-unit.target: 在`CreateOverrideSerializer`方法，<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>已创建，，并为每个重写的成员或枚举即<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>创建相应的属性设置，并添加到<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> is created using the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>, and that <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> is used to create the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> that overrides the default serialization.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping>使用创建<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>，且<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping>用于创建<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>可重写默认的序列化。

trans-unit.source: Adds a <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes" /> to the collection of <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes" /> objects contained by the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides" />.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes" /> 添加到 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes" /> 所包含的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides" /> 对象的集合中。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the object that is overridden.
trans-unit.target: 所替代的对象的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes" /> that represents the overriding attributes.
trans-unit.target: 表示重写特性的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes" />。

trans-unit.source: Adds a <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes" /> to a collection of <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes" /> 添加到 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes" /> 对象的集合。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="type" /> parameter specifies an object to be overridden by the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="type" /> 参数指定由 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes" /> 重写的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> contains a union of attribute objects that cause the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> to override its default serialization behavior for a set of objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>包含导致的 attribute 对象的联合<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>重写一组对象及其默认序列化行为。

trans-unit.source: You choose the attribute objects to place in the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>, depending on the particular behaviors you want to override.
trans-unit.target: 选择要将放入的属性对象<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>，取决于你想要重写的特定行为。

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> serializes a class member as an XML element by default.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>将类成员序列化为的 XML 元素形式，默认情况下。

trans-unit.source: If you want the member to be serialized as an XML attribute instead, you would create a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute>, assign it to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes.SoapAttribute%2A> property of a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>, and add the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要序列化为 XML 特性的成员，你将创建<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute>，将其分配给<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes.SoapAttribute%2A>属性<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>，并添加<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes>到<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides.Add%2A> method to add the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides.Add%2A>方法将添加<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>到<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>。

trans-unit.source: Use this overload to add a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> that contains a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: 此重载用于添加<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>包含<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute>。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute> overrides the serialization of a class, you need not specify a member of the class to override, only the type of the class.
trans-unit.target: 因为<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute>替代序列化的类，不需要指定类的成员，若要覆盖，只有类的类型。

trans-unit.source: The following example serializes a class named `Group`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例序列化类名为`Group`。

trans-unit.source: The serialization of the `GroupName` and `IgnoreThis` fields and the members of the `GroupType` enumeration are overridden.
trans-unit.target: 序列化`GroupName`和`IgnoreThis`字段和的成员`GroupType`枚举将被重写。

trans-unit.source: In the `CreateOverrideSerializer` method, a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> is created, and for each overridden member or enumeration, a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> is created with the appropriate property set and added to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>.
trans-unit.target: 在`CreateOverrideSerializer`方法，<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>已创建，，并为每个重写的成员或枚举即<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>创建相应的属性设置，并添加到<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> is created using the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>, and that <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> is used to create the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> that overrides the default serialization.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping>使用创建<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>，且<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping>用于创建<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>可重写默认的序列化。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the object to override.
trans-unit.target: 要替代的对象的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: The name of the member to override.
trans-unit.target: 要替代的成员的名称。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes" /> that represents the overriding attributes.
trans-unit.target: 表示重写特性的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes" />。

trans-unit.source: Adds a <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes" /> to the collection of <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes" /> objects contained by the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides" />.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes" /> 添加到 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes" /> 所包含的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides" /> 对象的集合中。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="type" /> parameter specifies the object to be overridden by the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="type" /> 参数指定由 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes" /> 重写的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="member" /> parameter specifies the name of a member that is overridden.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="member" /> 参数指定所替代的成员名称。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> contains a union of attribute objects that cause the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> to override its default serialization behavior for a set of objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>包含导致的 attribute 对象的联合<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>重写一组对象及其默认序列化行为。

trans-unit.source: You choose the attribute objects to place in the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>, depending on the particular behaviors you want to override.
trans-unit.target: 选择要将放入的属性对象<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>，取决于你想要重写的特定行为。

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> serializes a class member as an XML element by default.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>将类成员序列化为的 XML 元素形式，默认情况下。

trans-unit.source: If you want the member to be serialized as a SOAP attribute instead, you would create a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute>, assign it to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes.SoapAttribute%2A> property of a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>, and add the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要序列化为 SOAP 特性的成员，你将创建<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute>，将其分配给<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes.SoapAttribute%2A>属性<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>，并添加<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes>到<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides.Add%2A> method to add the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides.Add%2A>方法将添加<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>到<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>。

trans-unit.source: Use this method when the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> contains either a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultValueAttribute><xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute>, <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapEnumAttribute>, or <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapIgnoreAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法时<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>包含以下任一<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute>， <xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultValueAttribute> <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute>， <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapEnumAttribute>，或<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapIgnoreAttribute>。

trans-unit.source: The following example serializes a class named `Group`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例序列化类名为`Group`。

trans-unit.source: The serialization of the `GroupName` and `IgnoreThis` fields and the members of the `GroupType` enumeration are overridden.
trans-unit.target: 序列化`GroupName`和`IgnoreThis`字段和的成员`GroupType`枚举将被重写。

trans-unit.source: In the `CreateOverrideSerializer` method, a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> is created, and for each overridden member or enumeration, a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> is created with the appropriate property set and added to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>.
trans-unit.target: 在`CreateOverrideSerializer`方法，<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>已创建，，并为每个重写的成员或枚举即<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>创建相应的属性设置，并添加到<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> is created using the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>, and that <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> is used to create the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> that overrides the default serialization.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping>使用创建<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>，且<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping>用于创建<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>可重写默认的序列化。

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that represents the collection of overriding SOAP attributes.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个对象，该对象表示重写的 SOAP 特性的集合。

trans-unit.source: The base class <see cref="T:System.Type" /> that is associated with the collection of attributes you want to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 与要检索的属性的集合相关联的基类 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the object associated with the specified (base class) type.
trans-unit.target: 获取与指定（基类）类型关联的对象。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes" /> that represents the collection of overriding attributes.
trans-unit.target: 表示重写特性集合的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes" />。

trans-unit.source: Use this overload to return a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> that contains attributes for a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: 使用此重载返回<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>其中包含特性<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute>。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> that is used to override the serialization of an instance of the `Group` class.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>用于重写的实例的序列`Group`类。

trans-unit.source: The example also uses the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides.Item%2A> property to retrieve the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> that is used to specify how the serialization is being overridden.
trans-unit.target: 此示例还使用<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides.Item%2A>属性，以检索<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>，用于指定序列化被重写。

trans-unit.source: The base class <see cref="T:System.Type" /> that is associated with the collection of attributes you want to override.
trans-unit.target: 与要重写的特性的集合关联的基类 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: The name of the overridden member that specifies the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes" /> to return.
trans-unit.target: 指定要返回的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes" /> 的替代成员名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets the object associated with the specified (base class) type.
trans-unit.target: 获取与指定（基类）类型关联的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="member" /> parameter specifies the base class member that is overridden.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="member" /> 参数指定被重写的基类成员。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes" /> that represents the collection of overriding attributes.
trans-unit.target: 表示重写特性集合的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes" />。

trans-unit.source: Use this overload to return a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> that contains attributes that override a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute>, <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute>, <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapIgnoreAttribute>, or <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapEnumAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: 使用此重载返回<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>包含重写的属性<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute>， <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute>， <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapIgnoreAttribute>，或<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapEnumAttribute>。

trans-unit.source: You can also return a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> that contains the override of a default value that uses a <xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultValueAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以返回<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>，该字符串包含一个默认值，使用重写<xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultValueAttribute>。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> contains a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute>, you must use the overload that specifies only the overridden type.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>包含<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute>，则必须使用指定仅重写的类型的重载。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> used to override the serialization of an instance of the `Group` class.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>用于重写的实例的序列`Group`类。

trans-unit.source: The example also uses the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides.Item%2A> property to retrieve the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> that is used to specify how the serialization is being overridden.
trans-unit.target: 此示例还使用<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides.Item%2A>属性，以检索<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>，用于指定序列化被重写。
